unnormalised: Inventory forecasting is becoming increasingly critical for Indian manufacturers, especially with the festive season approaching. Imagine needing extra steel for constructing pandals in Kolkata or ensuring enough spices for biryani in Hyderabad during Ramadan. Inaccurate predictions can lead to stockouts or excess inventory, impacting profitability.
